intro: Dracula callifera, commonly known as the velvet terry, is a striking orchid native to the cloud forests of Ecuador. It is characterized by its vibrant purple and pink flowers, which are adorned with intricate, velvety patterns. The plant has long, slender stems and produces clusters of pendulous blooms that bloom in the early morning. Its unique floral structure and vivid coloration make it a popular choice among orchid enthusiasts. Dracula callifera thrives in humid, shaded environments and requires specific care to flourish.
